wcGeneSummary 0.99.0
  • Reference

    wcGeneSummary

    wcAbst

    wcAbst.Rd

    make word cloud or correlation network from PubMed

    Usage

    wcAbst(
  queries,
  redo = NULL,
  madeUpper = c("dna", "rna"),
  target = "abstract",
  usefil = NA,
  filnum = 0,
  pvclAlpha = 0.95,
  numOnly = TRUE,
  delim = "OR",
  geneUpper = TRUE,
  apiKey = NULL,
  tfidf = FALSE,
  pal = c("blue", "red"),
  numWords = 30,
  scaleRange = c(5, 10),
  showLegend = FALSE,
  plotType = "wc",
  colorText = FALSE,
  quote = FALSE,
  corThresh = 0.2,
  layout = "nicely",
  tag = FALSE,
  tagWhole = FALSE,
  onlyCorpus = FALSE,
  onlyTDM = FALSE,
  bn = FALSE,
  R = 20,
  retMax = 10,
  edgeLabel = FALSE,
  edgeLink = TRUE,
  ngram = NA,
  genePlot = FALSE,
  deleteZeroDeg = TRUE,
  additionalRemove = NA,
  orgDb = org.Hs.eg.db,
  preset = FALSE,
  onWholeDTM = FALSE,
  madeUpperGenes = TRUE,
  ...
)

    Arguments

    queries

    gene symbols (max: 5)

    redo

    if plot in other parameters, input the previous list

    madeUpper

    make the words uppercase in resulting plot

    target

    "abstract" or "title"

    usefil

    filter based on "gstfidf" (whole gene summary tf-idf) or "bsdbtfidf" (whole bugsigdb tf-idf)

    filnum

    specify filter tfidf

    pvclAlpha

    alpha for pvpick()

    numOnly

    delete number only

    delim

    delimiter for queries

    geneUpper

    make queries uppercase

    apiKey

    api key for eutilities

    tfidf

    use TfIdf when making TDM

    pal

    palette for color gradient in correlation network

    numWords

    the number of words to be shown

    scaleRange

    scale for label and node size in correlation network

    showLegend

    whether to show legend in correlation network

    plotType

    "wc" or "network"

    colorText

    color text label based on frequency in correlation network

    quote

    whether to quote the queries

    corThresh

    the correlation threshold

    layout

    the layout for correlation network, defaul to "nicely"

    tag

    cluster the words based on text using pvclust

    tagWhole

    tag based on whole data or subset

    onlyCorpus

    return only corpus

    onlyTDM

    return only TDM

    bn

    perform bootstrap-based Bayesian network inference instead of correlation using bnlearn

    R

    how many bootstrap when bn is stated

    retMax

    how many items are to be retlieved?

    edgeLabel

    if TRUE, plot the edge label (default: FALSE)

    edgeLink

    if FALSE, use geom_edge_diagonal

    ngram

    default to NA (1)

    genePlot

    plot associated genes (default: FALSE)

    deleteZeroDeg

    delete zero degree node from plot in correlation network

    additionalRemove

    specific words to be excluded

    orgDb

    org database, default to org.Hs.eg.db

    preset

    filter preset words

    onWholeDTM

    calculate correlation network on whole dataset or top-words specified by numWords

    madeUpperGenes

    make genes upper case automatically (default to TRUE)

    ...

    parameters to pass to wordcloud()

    Value

    list of data frame and ggplot2 object

    Examples

    wcAbst("DDX41")
#> proceeding without API key
#> proceeding without API key
#> type: pubmed_abstract
#> DDX41
#> 197.4 Kb
